purpose: Facilitate the development and deployment of distributed reinforcement learning applications
principle: Utilizes PyTorch for deep learning and distributed training to enable scalable reinforcement learning
reusability: Offers a modular framework that can be integrated with custom environments and extended with additional algorithms
limitations: Primarily focused on reinforcement learning; may require substantial computational resources for large-scale training
name: HandyRL
description: HandyRL is a handy and simple framework based on Python and PyTorch for distributed reinforcement learning that is applicable to your own environments.
highlight: Distributed reinforcement learning framework leveraging PyTorch for custom environments
